description: Meet the Poetic SlimBook Leather folio case for the New Lenovo Idea Tablet S2110 10.1-Inch 16 GB Tablet - so slim, you'll forget you had a case on your Lenovo Idea Tablet S2110 10.1-Inch 16 GB Tablet! Enjoy the elegant, smooth texture of the SlimBook, with this finely grained leather like material. Integrated durable panels allow you to not only protect your Lenovo Idea Tablet S2110 10.1-Inch 16 GB Tablet's precious screen, but also position your screen in a horizontal . Less is more with this thin protective folio case - the SlimBook by Exact DesignPoetic, an Exact Design Inc Brand, warrants the Poetic Brand of Products against defects in material or workmanship for a period 3 (three) Years from the original date of purchase of the product by a consumer through an authorized Poetic dealer. Poetic does not warrant, and is not responsible for, any smart phone, tablet or other device made by any manufacturer other than Poetic. If a defect arises in the materials or workmanship warranted by Poetic, Poetic will replace that unit as long as it falls within the warranty constraints.The Poetic name, logo, all product names, customer graphics, trademarks and service marks appearing on the Poetic website unless otherwise noted, are service marks, trademarks (whether registered or not) and/or trade dress of Poetic brand.
title: Poetic Slimbook Leather Case for Lenovo Idea Tablet S2110 10.1-Inch 16 GB Tablet Black (3 Year Manufacturer Warranty From Poetic)
